languages.text: "Уверен, госпожа Кибелла оценит ваши и мои старания! Что может быть более... типичным для окружения Лорд-капитана, чем торжественный прием в компании достойнейших членов экипажа?"

traits.locale_text: "О? Я уверен, что госпожа Кибелла оценит ваши чаяния и мои старания! Что может быть более... типичным для окружения Лорд-Капитана, чем светский прием в компании лучших людей из команды!"

languages.text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"
languages.original_text: "Уверен, госпожа Кибелла оценит ваши и мои старания! Что может быть более... типичным для окружения Лорд-капитана, чем торжественный прием в компании достойнейших членов экипажа?"

traits.locale_text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

"I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

"Why, I am quite confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a social gathering in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

"Why, I am quite confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a social gathering in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

"I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

"I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

languages.text: «Estoy convencido de que la maestra Kibellah apreciará el esfuerzo, ¡tanto el suyo como el mío! ¿Qué es más representativo del círculo de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que un evento formal en compañía de los miembros más eminentes de la tripulación?».
languages.original_text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

traits.locale_text: «Estoy convencido de que la maestra Kibellah apreciará el esfuerzo, ¡tanto el suyo como el mío! ¿Qué es más representativo del círculo de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que un evento formal en compañía de los miembros más eminentes de la tripulación?».

«Personalmente, estoy convencido de que la maestra Kibellah apreciará el esfuerzo, ¡tanto el suyo como el mío! ¿Qué es más representativo del círculo de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán que una reunión social en compañía de los miembros más eminentes de la tripulación?».

languages.text: 「キベラ様も、私とあなたの努力を高く評価してくださることでしょう！ロード・キャプテンの執行会として、最も優秀な乗組員たちとの正式なイベント程ふさわしいものはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

traits.locale_text: 「キベラ様も、私とあなたの努力を高く評価してくださることでしょう！ロード・キャプテンの執行会として、最も優秀な乗組員たちとの正式なイベント程ふさわしいものはないでしょう」
「キベラ様も、私とあなたの努力を高く評価してくださることでしょう！ロード・キャプテンの執行会として、最も優秀な乗組員たちとの社交の場程ふさわしいものはないでしょう」

languages.text: “我相信绮贝菈女士一定会感激您的付出与我的努力！参加晚会的宾客都是身份最为煊赫的船员，我相信没人能比他们更能代表舰长大人的核心圈子成员，您说是吧？”
languages.original_text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

traits.locale_text: “我相信绮贝菈女士一定会感激您的付出与我的努力！参加晚会的宾客都是身份最为煊赫的船员，我相信没人能比他们更能代表舰长大人的核心圈子成员，您说是吧？”
“您多虑了，我相信绮贝菈女士一定会感激您的付出与我的努力！参加晚会的宾客都是最出色的船员，我相信没人能比他们更能代表舰长大人的核心圈子成员。”

languages.text: "Ich bin mir sicher, Meisterin Kibellah wird die Mühe zu schätzen wissen, Eure wie meine! Was könnte den inneren Kreis des Lord Captain besser repräsentieren als ein formelles Treffen der wichtigsten Crewmitglieder?"
languages.original_text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin mir sicher, Meisterin Kibellah wird die Mühe zu schätzen wissen, Eure wie meine! Was könnte den inneren Kreis des Lord Captain besser repräsentieren als ein formelles Treffen der wichtigsten Crewmitglieder?"

"Nun, ich bin sicher, Herrin Kibellah wird die Mühe zu schätzen wissen, Eure wie meine! Was könnte den inneren Kreis des Lord Captain besser repräsentieren als eine Zusammenkunft der wichtigsten Crewmitglieder?"

languages.text: « Je suis convaincu qu'elle appréciera nos efforts, les vôtres comme les miens ! Quoi de plus représentatif du cercle intime {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} qu'une réunion formelle en compagnie des membres les plus éminents de l'équipage ? »
languages.original_text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis convaincu qu'elle appréciera nos efforts, les vôtres comme les miens ! Quoi de plus représentatif du cercle intime {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} qu'une réunion formelle en compagnie des membres les plus éminents de l'équipage ? »

« Pour ma part, je suis convaincu qu'elle appréciera nos efforts, les vôtres comme les miens ! Quoi de plus représentatif du cercle intime {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} qu'une réunion informelle en compagnie des membres les plus éminents de l'équipage ? »

languages.text: "Kibellah Hanım'ın her ikimizin de gösterdiği çabayı takdir edeceğinden eminim! Lord Kaptan'ın yakın çevresini, mürettebatın en seçkin mensupları eşliğindeki resmî bir etkinlikten daha ne iyi temsil edebilir?"
languages.original_text: "I am confident that Mistress Kibellah will appreciate the effort, both yours and mine! What could be more representative of the Lord Captain's inner circle than a formal event in the company of the most eminent members of the crew?"
